content.query:
DROP EXTERNAL TABLE DVDSales;
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE DVDSales (
	[OrderID] nvarchar(256),
	[OrderDetailID] nvarchar(256),
	[MovieID] nvarchar(256),
	[Quantity] int,
	[UnitCost] numeric(19,4),
	[LineNumber] int,
	[CustomerID] nvarchar(256),
	[OrderDate] date,
	[ShipDate] date,
	[TotalCost] numeric(19,4),
	[CreatedDate] date,
	[UpdatedDate] date,
	[DataSourceId] int
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'DVDSales',
	DATA_SOURCE = [silver_southridgedatalake01_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.DVDSales
GO
